105 /* DesignId : MMWL_DesignId_009 */
106 /* Requirements : AUTORADAR_REQ-752, AUTORADAR_REQ-757 */
107 rlReturnVal_t rlSetChannelConfig(rlUInt8_t deviceMap, rlChanCfg_t* data)
108 {
109  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
110 
111  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
112  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK) || (RL_NULL_PTR == data))
113  {
114  /* set return error code */
115  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
116  }
117  else
118  {
119  /* Package the command with given data and send it to device */
120  retVal = rlDriverExecuteSetApi(deviceMap, RL_RF_STATIC_CONF_SET_MSG,
121  RL_RF_CHAN_CONF_SB, (rlUInt8_t*)data,
122  (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlChanCfg_t));
123  }
124 
125  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetChannelConfig ends...\n");
126  return retVal;
127 
128 }

152 rlReturnVal_t rlSetAdcOutConfig(rlUInt8_t deviceMap, rlAdcOutCfg_t* data)
153 {
154  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
155 
156  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetAdcOutConfig starts...\n");
157 
158  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
159  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK) || \
160  (RL_NULL_PTR == data))
161  {
162  /* set return error code */
163  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
164  RL_LOGE_ARG0("rlSetAdcOutConfig, Invalid device map\n");
165  }
166  else
167  {
168  /* Package the command with given data and send it to device */
169  retVal = rlDriverExecuteSetApi(deviceMap, RL_RF_STATIC_CONF_SET_MSG,
170  RL_RF_ADCOUT_CONF_SB, (rlUInt8_t*)data,
171  (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlAdcOutCfg_t));
172  }
173 
174  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetAdcOutConfig ends...\n");
175 
176  return retVal;
177 }

281 /* DesignId : MMWL_DesignId_122 */
282 /* Requirements : AUTORADAR_REQ-727 */
283 rlReturnVal_t rlSetMultiBpmChirpConfig(rlUInt8_t deviceMap, rlUInt16_t cnt,
284  rlBpmChirpCfg_t** data)
285 {
286  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
287  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetMultiBpmChirpConfig starts...\n");
288 
289  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
290  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK) || (RL_NULL_PTR == data) || \
291  (cnt == 0U))
292  {
293  /* set return error code */
294  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
295  }
296  else
297  {
298  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
299  rlDriverMsg_t inMsg;
300  rlDriverMsg_t outMsg = {0};
301 
302  /* Index and other paramerters to send multiple sub blocks in one/more commands chunk */
303  rlUInt16_t sbLen, maxSbCntInMsg, sbCntInMsg, numChnkOfMsg, lastSbCntInMsg, loopCnt, indx;
304 
305 
306  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
307  rlPayloadSb_t inPayloadSb[RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX/(sizeof(rlBpmChirpCfg_t) + \
308  RL_SBC_ID_SIZE + RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE)];
309 
310  /* single sub-block length for chirp config API */
311  sbLen = (rlUInt16_t)(sizeof(rlBpmChirpCfg_t) + (RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE + RL_SBC_ID_SIZE));
312 
313  /* get Max Sub Block count */
314  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:D.4.1 <APPROVED> "sbLen can not be zero" */
315  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 127 D */
316  maxSbCntInMsg = (RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX /sbLen);
317 
318  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_OK;
319  /* if requested count of chirpConfig is within one Message packet */
320  if (cnt <= maxSbCntInMsg)
321  {
322  sbCntInMsg = cnt;
323  numChnkOfMsg = 1U;
324  lastSbCntInMsg = 0U;
325  }
326  else
327  {
328  sbCntInMsg = maxSbCntInMsg;
329  numChnkOfMsg = cnt / maxSbCntInMsg;
330  lastSbCntInMsg = cnt % maxSbCntInMsg;
331  }
332 
333  /* Fill in-message packet */
334  rlDriverConstructInMsg(RL_RF_ADVANCED_FEATURES_SET_MSG, &inMsg, &inPayloadSb[0]);
335 
336  loopCnt = (lastSbCntInMsg == 0U) ? numChnkOfMsg : (numChnkOfMsg + 1U);
337 
338  while (retVal == RL_RET_CODE_OK)
339  {
340  /* all full messages have been sent, then send last partial message */
341  if ((loopCnt == 1U) && (lastSbCntInMsg != 0U))
342  {
343  inMsg.opcode.nsbc = lastSbCntInMsg;
344  }
345  else
346  {
347  inMsg.opcode.nsbc = sbCntInMsg;
348  }
349 
350  for (indx = 0U; indx < inMsg.opcode.nsbc; indx++)
351  {
352  /* Set Command Sub Block*/
353  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
354  LDRA Tool Issue" */
355  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
356  inPayloadSb[indx].sbid = RL_GET_UNIQUE_SBID(RL_RF_ADVANCED_FEATURES_SET_MSG,
357  RL_RF_BPM_CHIRP_CONF_SB);
358  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
359  LDRA Tool Issue" */
360  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
361  inPayloadSb[indx].len = (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlBpmChirpCfg_t);
362  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
363  LDRA Tool Issue" */
364  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
365  inPayloadSb[indx].pSblkData = (rlUInt8_t*)(*data);
366 
367  /*AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.18.1 <APPROVED> "require pointer increment to jump to
368  next profile Config */
369  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 567 S */
370  data++;
371  }
372  /* Send Command to mmWave Radar Device */
373  retVal += rlDriverCmdInvoke(deviceMap, inMsg, &outMsg);
374  loopCnt--;
375 
376  if (loopCnt == 0U)
377  {
378  break;
379  }
380  }
381  }
382  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetMultiBpmChirpConfig ends...\n");
383 
384  return retVal;
385 }
386 
412 /* DesignId : MMWL_DesignId_013 */
413 /* Requirements : AUTORADAR_REQ-728, AUTORADAR_REQ-729, AUTORADAR_REQ-730, AUTORADAR_REQ-731,
414  AUTORADAR_REQ-732, AUTORADAR_REQ-733, AUTORADAR_REQ-734, AUTORADAR_REQ-735,
415  AUTORADAR_REQ-736, AUTORADAR_REQ-737, AUTORADAR_REQ-738, AUTORADAR_REQ-739,
416  AUTORADAR_REQ-740, AUTORADAR_REQ-741, AUTORADAR_REQ-742, AUTORADAR_REQ-743,
417  AUTORADAR_REQ-773
418  */
419 rlReturnVal_t rlSetProfileConfig(rlUInt8_t deviceMap, rlUInt16_t cnt,
420  rlProfileCfg_t* data)
421 {
422  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
423 
424  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetProfileConfig starts...\n");
425 
426  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
427  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK) || \
428  (RL_NULL_PTR == data) || (cnt == 0U))
429  {
430  /* set return error code */
431  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
432  RL_LOGE_ARG0("rlSetProfileConfig, Invalid device map\n");
433  }
434  else
435  {
436  rlDriverMsg_t inMsg = {0};
437  rlDriverMsg_t outMsg = {0};
438 
439  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
440  rlPayloadSb_t inPayloadSb[RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX/(sizeof(rlProfileCfg_t) + \
441  RL_SBC_ID_SIZE + RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE)];
442  /* Variable to count message chunks */
443  rlUInt16_t indx;
444  rlUInt16_t sbCntInAllChunk = 0U;
445  rlUInt16_t maxSbInMsg = (RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX /(sizeof(rlProfileCfg_t) + \
446  RL_SBC_ID_SIZE + RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE));
447 
448  /* Construct command packet */
449  rlDriverConstructInMsg(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_SET_MSG, &inMsg, &inPayloadSb[0]);
450 
451  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_OK;
452  /* Loop to copy all the command data to one message */
453  for (indx = 0U; (indx < cnt) && (retVal == RL_RET_CODE_OK); indx++)
454  {
455  /* Fill in-message payload */
456  /*AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.18.1 <APPROVED> "require pointer increment to jump to
457  next profile Config */
458  /*AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.18.4 <APPROVED> "require pointer increment to jump to
459  next profile Config */
460  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 87 S */
461  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 567 S */
462  rlDriverFillPayload(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_SET_MSG, RL_RF_PROFILE_CONF_SB,
463  &inPayloadSb[indx], (rlUInt8_t*)(data + indx),
464  (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlProfileCfg_t));
465 
466  /* increment Sub-block count in one packet */
467  sbCntInAllChunk++;
468 
469  /* check if total payload length is going beyond defined limitation */
470  if ((maxSbInMsg == (indx + 1U)) || (cnt == sbCntInAllChunk))
471  {
472  /* setting of numSBC to inMsg */
473  inMsg.opcode.nsbc = (indx + 1U);
474  /* Send Command to mmWave Radar Device */
475  retVal += rlDriverCmdInvoke(deviceMap, inMsg, &outMsg);
476  }
477  }
478  }
479 
480  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetProfileConfig ends...\n");
481 
482  return retVal;
483 }
484 
498 /* DesignId : MMWL_DesignId_118 */
499 /* Requirements : AUTORADAR_REQ-728, AUTORADAR_REQ-729, AUTORADAR_REQ-730, AUTORADAR_REQ-731,
500 AUTORADAR_REQ-732, AUTORADAR_REQ-733, AUTORADAR_REQ-734, AUTORADAR_REQ-735,
501 AUTORADAR_REQ-736, AUTORADAR_REQ-737, AUTORADAR_REQ-738, AUTORADAR_REQ-739,
502 AUTORADAR_REQ-740, AUTORADAR_REQ-741, AUTORADAR_REQ-742, AUTORADAR_REQ-743,
503 AUTORADAR_REQ-773
504 */
505 rlReturnVal_t rlGetProfileConfig(rlUInt8_t deviceMap, rlUInt16_t profileId, rlProfileCfg_t* data)
506 {
507  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
508 
509  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlGetProfileConfig ends...\n");
510 
511  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
512  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK) || \
513  (RL_NULL_PTR == data))
514  {
515  /* set return error code */
516  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
517  RL_LOGE_ARG0("rlGetProfileConfig, Invalid device map\n");
518  }
519  else
520  {
521  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
522  rlDriverMsg_t inMsg = {0};
523  rlDriverMsg_t outMsg = {0};
524  rlPayloadSb_t inPayloadSb = {0};
525  rlPayloadSb_t outPayloadSb = {0};
526  rlWordParam_t wordParam;
527  /* combine half words into WORD structure */
528  wordParam.halfWordOne = profileId;
529  wordParam.halfWordTwo = 0U;
530 
531  /* Construct command packet */
532  rlDriverConstructInMsg(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_GET_MSG, &inMsg, &inPayloadSb);
533  /* Fill in-message Payload */
534  rlDriverFillPayload(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_GET_MSG, RL_RF_PROFILE_CONF_SB, &inPayloadSb,
535  (rlUInt8_t*)&wordParam, (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlWordParam_t));
536 
537  /* Construct response packet */
538  rlDriverConstructOutMsg(1U, &outMsg, &outPayloadSb);
539  /* Fill in-message Payload */
540  rlDriverFillPayload(0U, 0U, &outPayloadSb, (rlUInt8_t*)data, 0U);
541 
542  /* Send Command to mmWave Radar Device */
543  retVal = rlDriverCmdInvoke(deviceMap, inMsg, &outMsg);
544  }
545 
546  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlGetProfileConfig ends...\n");
547  return retVal;
548 }
549 
582 /* DesignId : MMWL_DesignId_014 */
583 /* Requirements : AUTORADAR_REQ-744, AUTORADAR_REQ-745, AUTORADAR_REQ-746, AUTORADAR_REQ-747,
584  AUTORADAR_REQ-748, AUTORADAR_REQ-749, AUTORADAR_REQ-750, AUTORADAR_REQ-751,
585  AUTORADAR_REQ-773
586  */
587 rlReturnVal_t rlSetChirpConfig(rlUInt8_t deviceMap, rlUInt16_t cnt, rlChirpCfg_t* data)
588 {
589  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
590 
591  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetChirpConfig starts...\n");
592 
593  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
594  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK) || \
595  (RL_NULL_PTR == data) || (cnt == 0U))
596  {
597  /* set return error code */
598  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
599  }
600  else
601  {
602  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
603  rlDriverMsg_t inMsg;
604  rlDriverMsg_t outMsg = {0};
605  /* Index and other paramerters to send multiple sub blocks in one/more commands chunk */
606  rlUInt16_t sbLen, maxSbCntInMsg, sbCntInMsg, numChnkOfMsg, lastSbCntInMsg, loopCnt, indx;
607 
608  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
609  rlPayloadSb_t inPayloadSb[RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX/(sizeof(rlChirpCfg_t) + \
610  RL_SBC_ID_SIZE + RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE)];
611 
612  /* single sub-block length for chirp config API */
613  sbLen = (rlUInt16_t)(sizeof(rlChirpCfg_t) + (RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE + RL_SBC_ID_SIZE));
614 
615  /* get Max Sub Block count */
616  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:D.4.1 <APPROVED> "sbLen can not be zero" */
617  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 127 D */
618  maxSbCntInMsg = (RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX /sbLen);
619 
620  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_OK;
621  /* if requested count of chirpConfig is within one Message packet */
622  if (cnt <= maxSbCntInMsg)
623  {
624  sbCntInMsg = cnt;
625  numChnkOfMsg = 1U;
626  lastSbCntInMsg = 0U;
627  }
628  else
629  {
630  sbCntInMsg = maxSbCntInMsg;
631  numChnkOfMsg = cnt / maxSbCntInMsg;
632  lastSbCntInMsg = cnt % maxSbCntInMsg;
633  }
634 
635  /* Fill in-message packet */
636  rlDriverConstructInMsg(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_SET_MSG, &inMsg, &inPayloadSb[0]);
637  /* get the loop count in form of number of msg chunks */
638  loopCnt = (lastSbCntInMsg == 0U) ? numChnkOfMsg : (numChnkOfMsg + 1U);
639 
640  while (retVal == RL_RET_CODE_OK)
641  {
642  /* all full messages have been sent, then send last partial message */
643  if ((loopCnt == 1U) && (lastSbCntInMsg != 0U))
644  {
645  inMsg.opcode.nsbc = lastSbCntInMsg;
646  }
647  else
648  {
649  inMsg.opcode.nsbc = sbCntInMsg;
650  }
651 
652  for (indx = 0U; indx < inMsg.opcode.nsbc; indx++)
653  {
654  /* Set Command Sub Block*/
655  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
656  LDRA Tool Issue" */
657  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
658  inPayloadSb[indx].sbid = RL_GET_UNIQUE_SBID(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_SET_MSG,
659  RL_RF_CHIRP_CONF_SB);
660  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
661  LDRA Tool Issue" */
662  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
663  inPayloadSb[indx].len = (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlChirpCfg_t);
664  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
665  LDRA Tool Issue" */
666  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
667  inPayloadSb[indx].pSblkData = (rlUInt8_t*)(data);
668  /*AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.18.1 <APPROVED> "require pointer increment to jump to \
669  next chirp Config */
670  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 567 S */
671  data++;
672  }
673  /* Send Command to mmWave Radar Device */
674  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
675  LDRA Tool Issue" */
676  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
677  retVal += rlDriverCmdInvoke(deviceMap, inMsg, &outMsg);
678  /* decrement the loop count */
679  loopCnt--;
680  /* if all chirp configurations have been sent to device then terminate the loop */
681  if (loopCnt == 0U)
682  {
683  break;
684  }
685  }
686  }
687 
688  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetChirpConfig ends...\n");
689 
690  return retVal;
691 }
692 
706 /* DesignId : MMWL_DesignId_119 */
707 /* Requirements : AUTORADAR_REQ-744, AUTORADAR_REQ-745, AUTORADAR_REQ-746, AUTORADAR_REQ-747,
708 AUTORADAR_REQ-748, AUTORADAR_REQ-749, AUTORADAR_REQ-750, AUTORADAR_REQ-751,
709 AUTORADAR_REQ-773
710 */
711 rlReturnVal_t rlGetChirpConfig(rlUInt8_t deviceMap, rlUInt16_t chirpStartIdx,
712  rlUInt16_t chirpEndIdx, rlChirpCfg_t* data)
713 {
714  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
715  rlChirpCfg_t *chirpCfgData = data;
716 
717  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlGetChirpConfig starts...\n");
718 
719  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
720  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK) || \
721  (RL_NULL_PTR == chirpCfgData))
722  {
723  /* set return error code */
724  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
725  RL_LOGE_ARG0("rlGetChirpConfig, Invalid device map\n");
726  }
727  else
728  {
729  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
730  rlDriverMsg_t inMsg = {0};
731  rlDriverMsg_t outMsg = {0};
732  /* Index and other paramerters to send multiple sub blocks in one/more commands chunk */
733  rlUInt16_t sbLen, maxSbCntOutMsg, sbCntOutMsg, numChnkOfMsg, lastSbCntOutMsg, loopCnt;
734 
735  /* file chirp start and end index */
736  rlWordParam_t wordParam;
737 
738  rlPayloadSb_t inPayloadSb = {0};
739  rlPayloadSb_t outPayloadSb;
740 
741  /* single sub-block length for chirp config API */
742  sbLen = (rlUInt16_t)(sizeof(rlChirpCfg_t));
743 
744  /* get Max Sub Block count */
745  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:D.4.1 <APPROVED> "sbLen can not be zero" */
746  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 127 D */
747  maxSbCntOutMsg = (RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX -(RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE + RL_SBC_ID_SIZE)) /sbLen;
748 
749  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_OK;
750  /* if requested count of chirpConfig is within one Message packet */
751  if ((chirpEndIdx - chirpStartIdx + 1U) <= maxSbCntOutMsg)
752  {
753  sbCntOutMsg = (chirpEndIdx - chirpStartIdx + 1U);
754  numChnkOfMsg = 0U;
755  lastSbCntOutMsg = 0U;
756  }
757  else
758  {
759  sbCntOutMsg = maxSbCntOutMsg;
760  numChnkOfMsg = (chirpEndIdx - chirpStartIdx + 1U) / maxSbCntOutMsg;
761  lastSbCntOutMsg = (chirpEndIdx - chirpStartIdx + 1U) % maxSbCntOutMsg;
762  }
763  /* set chirp start index to inMsg field */
764  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "required to intial with startIdx" */
765  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 8 D */
766  wordParam.halfWordTwo = chirpStartIdx;
767 
768  /* get the loop count in form of number of msg chunks */
769  loopCnt = numChnkOfMsg + 1U;
770  /* setting num of sub-block to one in outMsg */
771  outMsg.opcode.nsbc = 1U;
772 
773  while (retVal == RL_RET_CODE_OK)
774  {
775  /* combine half words into WORD structure */
776  wordParam.halfWordOne = wordParam.halfWordTwo;
777  /* all full messages have been sent, then send last partial message */
778  if ((loopCnt == 1U) && (lastSbCntOutMsg != 0U))
779  {
780  wordParam.halfWordTwo = wordParam.halfWordOne + (lastSbCntOutMsg - 1U);
781  }
782  else
783  {
784  wordParam.halfWordTwo = wordParam.halfWordOne + (sbCntOutMsg - 1U);
785  }
786 
787  /* Construct command packet */
788  rlDriverConstructInMsg(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_GET_MSG, &inMsg, &inPayloadSb);
789  /* Fill in-message Payload */
790  rlDriverFillPayload(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_GET_MSG, RL_RF_CHIRP_CONF_SB, &inPayloadSb,
791  (rlUInt8_t*)&wordParam, (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlWordParam_t));
792 
793  /* Set Command Sub Block*/
794  outPayloadSb.sbid = RL_GET_UNIQUE_SBID(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_GET_MSG,
795  RL_RF_CHIRP_CONF_SB);
796  outPayloadSb.len = (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlChirpCfg_t);
797  outPayloadSb.pSblkData = (rlUInt8_t*)(chirpCfgData);
798 
799  /* Construct response packet */
800  rlDriverConstructOutMsg(outMsg.opcode.nsbc, &outMsg, &outPayloadSb);
801 
802  /* Send Command to mmWave Radar Device */
803  retVal += rlDriverCmdInvoke(deviceMap, inMsg, &outMsg);
804 
805  /* increment data pointer for next chunk of reponse */
806  chirpCfgData += sbCntOutMsg;
807 
808  /* decrement the loop count */
809  loopCnt--;
810  wordParam.halfWordTwo++;
811  /* if all chirp configurations have been sent to device then terminate the loop */
812  if (loopCnt == 0U)
813  {
814  break;
815  }
816  }
817  }
818 
819  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlGetChirpConfig ends...\n");
820 
821  return retVal;
822 }
823 
824 
849 rlReturnVal_t rlSetMultiChirpCfg(rlUInt8_t deviceMap, rlUInt16_t cnt,
850  rlChirpCfg_t **data)
851 {
852  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
853  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetMultiChirpCfg starts...\n");
854 
855  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
856  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK) || (RL_NULL_PTR == data) || \
857  (cnt == 0U))
858  {
859  /* set return error code */
860  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
861  }
862  else
863  {
864  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
865  rlDriverMsg_t inMsg;
866  rlDriverMsg_t outMsg = {0};
867 
868  /* Index and other paramerters to send multiple sub blocks in one/more commands chunk */
869  rlUInt16_t sbLen, maxSbCntInMsg, sbCntInMsg, numChnkOfMsg, lastSbCntInMsg, loopCnt, indx;
870 
871 
872  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
873  rlPayloadSb_t inPayloadSb[RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX/(sizeof(rlChirpCfg_t) + \
874  RL_SBC_ID_SIZE + RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE)];
875 
876  /* single sub-block length for chirp config API */
877  sbLen = (rlUInt16_t)(sizeof(rlChirpCfg_t) + (RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE + RL_SBC_ID_SIZE));
878 
879 
880  /* get Max Sub Block count */
881  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:D.4.1 <APPROVED> "sbLen can not be zero" */
882  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 127 D */
883  maxSbCntInMsg = (RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX /sbLen);
884 
885  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_OK;
886  /* if requested count of chirpConfig is within one Message packet */
887  if (cnt <= maxSbCntInMsg)
888  {
889  sbCntInMsg = cnt;
890  numChnkOfMsg = 1U;
891  lastSbCntInMsg = 0U;
892  }
893  else
894  {
895  sbCntInMsg = maxSbCntInMsg;
896  numChnkOfMsg = cnt / maxSbCntInMsg;
897  lastSbCntInMsg = cnt % maxSbCntInMsg;
898  }
899 
900  /* Fill in-message packet */
901  rlDriverConstructInMsg(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_SET_MSG, &inMsg, &inPayloadSb[0]);
902 
903  loopCnt = (lastSbCntInMsg == 0U) ? numChnkOfMsg : (numChnkOfMsg + 1U);
904 
905  while (retVal == RL_RET_CODE_OK)
906  {
907  /* all full messages have been sent, then send last partial message */
908  if ((loopCnt == 1U) && (lastSbCntInMsg != 0U))
909  {
910  inMsg.opcode.nsbc = lastSbCntInMsg;
911  }
912  else
913  {
914  inMsg.opcode.nsbc = sbCntInMsg;
915  }
916 
917  for (indx = 0U; indx < inMsg.opcode.nsbc; indx++)
918  {
919  /* Set Command Sub Block*/
920  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
921  LDRA Tool Issue" */
922  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
923  inPayloadSb[indx].sbid = RL_GET_UNIQUE_SBID(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_SET_MSG,
924  RL_RF_CHIRP_CONF_SB);
925  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
926  LDRA Tool Issue" */
927  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
928  inPayloadSb[indx].len = (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlChirpCfg_t);
929  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
930  LDRA Tool Issue" */
931  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
932  inPayloadSb[indx].pSblkData = (rlUInt8_t*)(*data);
933 
934  /*AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.18.1 <APPROVED> "require pointer increment to jump to
935  next profile Config */
936  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 567 S */
937  data++;
938  }
939  /* Send Command to mmWave Radar Device */
940  retVal += rlDriverCmdInvoke(deviceMap, inMsg, &outMsg);
941  loopCnt--;
942 
943  if (loopCnt == 0U)
944  {
945  break;
946  }
947  }
948  }
949  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetMultiChirpCfg ends...\n");
950  return retVal;
951 }
952 
973 /* DesignId : MMWL_DesignId_015 */
974 /* Requirements : AUTORADAR_REQ-715, AUTORADAR_REQ-716, AUTORADAR_REQ-717,
975  AUTORADAR_REQ-718, AUTORADAR_REQ-719, AUTORADAR_REQ-720 */
976 rlReturnVal_t rlSetFrameConfig(rlUInt8_t deviceMap, rlFrameCfg_t* data)
977 {
978  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
979 
980  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetFrameConfig starts...\n");
981 
982  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
983  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK) || \
984  (RL_NULL_PTR == data))
985  {
986  /* set return error code */
987  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
988  RL_LOGE_ARG0("rlSetFrameConfig, Invalid device map\n");
989  }
990  else
991  {
992  /* Package the command with given data and send it to device */
993  retVal = rlDriverExecuteSetApi(deviceMap, RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_SET_MSG,
994  RL_RF_FRAME_CONF_SB, (rlUInt8_t*)data,
995  (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlFrameCfg_t));
996 
997  /* If only mmWaveLink instance is running on Host */
998  if ((retVal == RL_RET_CODE_OK) && (RL_PLATFORM_HOST == rlDriverGetPlatformId()))
999  {
1000  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
1001  rlDriverMsg_t inMsg = {0};
1002  rlDriverMsg_t outMsg = {0};
1003  rlPayloadSb_t inPayloadSb = {0};
1004  rlFrameApplyCfg_t frameApplyCfgArgs;
1005  rlUInt16_t tempVar;
1006  frameApplyCfgArgs.reserved = 0U;
1007  frameApplyCfgArgs.numAdcSamples = (data->numAdcSamples);
1008  tempVar = ((data->chirpEndIdx - data->chirpStartIdx) + 1U) *
1009  (data->numLoops);
1010 #ifndef MMWL_BIG_ENDIAN
1011  frameApplyCfgArgs.numChirps = tempVar;
1012 #else
1013  frameApplyCfgArgs.numChirps = RL_SWAP_32(tempVar);
1014 #endif
1015  /* Construct command packet */
1016  rlDriverConstructInMsg(RL_DEV_CONFIG_APPLY_MSG, &inMsg, &inPayloadSb);
1017  /* Fill in-message Payload */
1018  rlDriverFillPayload(RL_DEV_CONFIG_APPLY_MSG, RL_SYS_CONFIG_APPLY_SB,
1019  &inPayloadSb, (rlUInt8_t*)&frameApplyCfgArgs,
1020  (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlFrameApplyCfg_t));
1021 
1022  /* Send Command to mmWave Radar Device */
1023  retVal += rlDriverCmdInvoke(deviceMap, inMsg, &outMsg);
1024  }
1025  }
1026 
1027  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSetFrameConfig ends...\n");
1028 
1029  return retVal;
1030 }

1098 #endif

1376 /* DesignId : MMWL_DesignId_017 */
1377 /* Requirements : AUTORADAR_REQ-759 */
1378 rlReturnVal_t rlSensorStart(rlUInt8_t deviceMap)
1379 {
1380  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
1381 
1382  rlFrameTrigger_t frameTriggerArgs;
1383 
1384  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlSensorStart starts...\n");
1385 
1386  frameTriggerArgs.startStop = RL_FRAME_TRIGGER_START;
1387  frameTriggerArgs.reserved = 0U;
1388 
1389  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
1390  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK))
1391  {
1392  /* set return error code */
1393  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
1394  RL_LOGE_ARG0("rlSensorStart, Invalid device map\n");
1395  }
1396  else
1397  {
1398  /* Package the command with given data and send it to device */
1399  retVal = rlDriverExecuteSetApi(deviceMap, RL_RF_FRAME_TRIG_MSG,
1400  RL_RF_FRAMESTARTSTOP_CONF_SB,
1401  (rlUInt8_t*)(&frameTriggerArgs),
1402  (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlFrameTrigger_t));

1858 /* DesignId : MMWL_DesignId_045 */
1859 /* Requirements : AUTORADAR_REQ-798 */
1860 rlReturnVal_t rlRfSetPhaseShiftConfig(rlUInt8_t deviceMap, rlUInt16_t cnt,
1861  rlRfPhaseShiftCfg_t* data)
1862 {
1863  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
1864 
1865  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlRfSetPhaseShiftConfig starts...\n");
1866 
1867  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
1868  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK) || \
1869  (RL_NULL_PTR == data) || (cnt == 0U))
1870  {
1871  /* set return error code */
1872  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
1873  }
1874  else
1875  {
1876  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
1877  rlDriverMsg_t inMsg;
1878  rlDriverMsg_t outMsg = {0};
1879  /* Index and other paramerters to send multiple sub blocks in one/more commands chunk */
1880  rlUInt16_t sbLen, maxSbCntInMsg, sbCntInMsg, numChnkOfMsg, lastSbCntInMsg, loopCnt, indx;
1881 
1882  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
1883  rlPayloadSb_t inPayloadSb[RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX/(sizeof(rlRfPhaseShiftCfg_t) + \
1884  RL_SBC_ID_SIZE + RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE)];
1885 
1886  /* single sub-block length for chirp config API */
1887  sbLen = (rlUInt16_t)(sizeof(rlRfPhaseShiftCfg_t) + (RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE + RL_SBC_ID_SIZE));
1888 
1889  /* get Max Sub Block count */
1890  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:D.4.1 <APPROVED> "sbLen can not be zero" */
1891  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 127 D */
1892  maxSbCntInMsg = (RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX /sbLen);
1893 
1894  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_OK;
1895  /* if requested count of chirpConfig is within one Message packet */
1896  if (cnt <= maxSbCntInMsg)
1897  {
1898  sbCntInMsg = cnt;
1899  numChnkOfMsg = 1U;
1900  lastSbCntInMsg = 0U;
1901  }
1902  else
1903  {
1904  sbCntInMsg = maxSbCntInMsg;
1905  numChnkOfMsg = cnt / maxSbCntInMsg;
1906  lastSbCntInMsg = cnt % maxSbCntInMsg;
1907  }
1908 
1909  /* Fill in-message packet */
1910  rlDriverConstructInMsg(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_SET_MSG, &inMsg, &inPayloadSb[0]);
1911  /* get the loop count in form of number of msg chunks */
1912  loopCnt = (lastSbCntInMsg == 0U) ? numChnkOfMsg : (numChnkOfMsg + 1U);
1913 
1914  while (retVal == RL_RET_CODE_OK)
1915  {
1916  /* all full messages have been sent, then send last partial message */
1917  if ((loopCnt == 1U) && (lastSbCntInMsg != 0U))
1918  {
1919  inMsg.opcode.nsbc = lastSbCntInMsg;
1920  }
1921  else
1922  {
1923  inMsg.opcode.nsbc = sbCntInMsg;
1924  }
1925 
1926  for (indx = 0U; indx < inMsg.opcode.nsbc; indx++)
1927  {
1928  /* Set Command Sub Block*/
1929  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
1930  LDRA Tool Issue" */
1931  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
1932  inPayloadSb[indx].sbid = RL_GET_UNIQUE_SBID(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_SET_MSG,
1933  RL_RF_PERCHIRPPHASESHIFT_CONF_SB);
1934  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
1935  LDRA Tool Issue" */
1936  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
1937  inPayloadSb[indx].len = (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlRfPhaseShiftCfg_t);
1938  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
1939  LDRA Tool Issue" */
1940  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
1941  inPayloadSb[indx].pSblkData = (rlUInt8_t*)(data);
1942  /*AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.18.1 <APPROVED> "require pointer increment to jump to \
1943  next chirp Config */
1944  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 567 S */
1945  data++;
1946  }
1947  /* Send Command to mmWave Radar Device */
1948  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
1949  LDRA Tool Issue" */
1950  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
1951  retVal += rlDriverCmdInvoke(deviceMap, inMsg, &outMsg);
1952  /* decrement the loop count */
1953  loopCnt--;
1954  /* if all phase shift configs have been sent to device then terminate the loop */
1955  if (loopCnt == 0U)
1956  {
1957  break;
1958  }
1959  }
1960  }
1961 
1962  RL_LOGV_ARG0("rlRfSetPhaseShiftConfig ends...\n");
1963 
1964  return retVal;
1965 }
1966

2454  /* set return error code */

2456  RL_LOGE_ARG0("rlRxGainTempLutRead, Invalid device map\n");
2457  }
2458  else
2459  {
2460  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
2461  rlDriverMsg_t inMsg = {0};
2462  rlDriverMsg_t outMsg = {0};
2463 
2464  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
2465  rlPayloadSb_t inPayloadSb = {0};
2466  rlPayloadSb_t outPayloadSb = {0};
2467 
2468  /* Fill in-message Payload */
2469  rlDriverFillPayload(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_GET_MSG, RL_RF_RX_GAIN_TEMPLUT_CONF_SB,

2691 /* DesignId : MMWL_DesignId_063 */
2692 /* Requirements : AUTORADAR_REQ-902 */
2693 rlReturnVal_t rlSetDynChirpCfg(rlUInt8_t deviceMap, rlUInt16_t segCnt,
2694  rlDynChirpCfg_t **data)
2695 {
2696  rlReturnVal_t retVal;
2697 
2698  /* check if deviceIndex is out of defined value */
2699  if ((rlDriverIsDeviceMapValid(deviceMap) != RL_RET_CODE_OK) || (RL_NULL_PTR == data) || \
2700  (segCnt == 0U))
2701  {
2702  /* set return error code */
2703  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
2704  }
2705  else
2706  {
2707  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
2708  rlDriverMsg_t inMsg;
2709  rlDriverMsg_t outMsg = {0};
2710 
2711  /* Index and other paramerters to send multiple sub blocks in one/more commands chunk */
2712  rlUInt16_t sbLen, maxSbCntInMsg, sbCntInMsg, numChnkOfMsg, lastSbCntInMsg, loopCnt, indx;
2713 
2714 
2715  /* Initialize Command and Response Sub Blocks */
2716  rlPayloadSb_t inPayloadSb[RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX/(sizeof(rlDynChirpCfg_t) + \
2717  RL_SBC_ID_SIZE + RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE)];
2718 
2719  /* single sub-block length for chirp config API */
2720  sbLen = (rlUInt16_t)(sizeof(rlDynChirpCfg_t) + (RL_SBC_LEN_SIZE + RL_SBC_ID_SIZE));
2721 
2722 
2723  /* get Max Sub Block count */
2724  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:D.4.1 <APPROVED> "sbLen can not be zero" */
2725  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 127 D */
2726  maxSbCntInMsg = (RL_CMD_PL_LEN_MAX /sbLen);
2727 
2728  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_OK;
2729  /* if requested count of chirpConfig is within one Message packet */
2730  if (segCnt <= maxSbCntInMsg)
2731  {
2732  sbCntInMsg = segCnt;
2733  numChnkOfMsg = 1U;
2734  lastSbCntInMsg = 0U;
2735  }
2736  else
2737  {
2738  sbCntInMsg = maxSbCntInMsg;
2739  numChnkOfMsg = segCnt / maxSbCntInMsg;
2740  lastSbCntInMsg = segCnt % maxSbCntInMsg;
2741  }
2742 
2743  /* Fill in-message packet */
2744  rlDriverConstructInMsg(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_SET_MSG, &inMsg, &inPayloadSb[0]);
2745 
2746  loopCnt = (lastSbCntInMsg == 0U) ? numChnkOfMsg : (numChnkOfMsg + 1U);
2747 
2748  while (retVal == RL_RET_CODE_OK)
2749  {
2750  /* all full messages have been sent, then send last partial message */
2751  if ((loopCnt == 1U) && (lastSbCntInMsg != 0U))
2752  {
2753  inMsg.opcode.nsbc = lastSbCntInMsg;
2754  }
2755  else
2756  {
2757  inMsg.opcode.nsbc = sbCntInMsg;
2758  }
2759 
2760  for (indx = 0U; indx < inMsg.opcode.nsbc; indx++)
2761  {
2762  /* Set Command Sub Block*/
2763  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
2764  LDRA Tool Issue" */
2765  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
2766  inPayloadSb[indx].sbid = RL_GET_UNIQUE_SBID(RL_RF_DYNAMIC_CONF_SET_MSG,
2767  RL_RF_DYN_CHIRP_CFG_SET_SB);
2768  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
2769  LDRA Tool Issue" */
2770  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
2771  inPayloadSb[indx].len = (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlDynChirpCfg_t);
2772  /* AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.2.2 <APPROVED> "Values are used by called function. \
2773  LDRA Tool Issue" */
2774  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 105 D */
2775  inPayloadSb[indx].pSblkData = (rlUInt8_t*)(*data);
2776 
2777  /*AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.18.1 <APPROVED> "require pointer increment to jump to \
2778  next Config */
2779  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 567 S */
2780  data++;
2781  }
2782  /* Send Command to mmWave Radar Device */
2783  retVal += rlDriverCmdInvoke(deviceMap, inMsg, &outMsg);
2784  loopCnt--;
2785 
2786  if (loopCnt == 0U)
2787  {
2788  break;
2789  }
2790  }
2791  }
2792  return retVal;
2793 }

2978  /* set return error code */
2979  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_INVALID_INPUT;
2980  }

2984  rlDriverMsg_t inMsg = {0};
2985  rlDriverMsg_t outMsg = {0};

2987  rlPayloadSb_t outPayloadSb = {0};
2988  /* set return value to zero by default */
2989  retVal = RL_RET_CODE_OK;
2990  /* Invoke Set Calibration data command for RL_MAX_CALIB_DATA_CHUNK chunks */
2991  for (idx = 0U; idx < RL_MAX_CALIB_DATA_CHUNK; idx++)
2992  {
2993  /* Construct command packet */
2994  rlDriverConstructInMsg(RL_RF_STATIC_CONF_SET_MSG, &inMsg, &inPayloadSb);
2995  /* Fill in-message Payload */
2996  /*AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.18.1 <APPROVED> "require pointer increment to jump to
2997  next calibData */
2998  /*AR_CODE_REVIEW MR:R.18.1 <APPROVED> "require pointer increment to jump to
2999  next calibData */
3000  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 87 S */
3001  /*LDRA_INSPECTED 567 S */
3002  rlDriverFillPayload(RL_RF_STATIC_CONF_SET_MSG, RL_RF_CAL_DATA_RD_WR_SB, &inPayloadSb,
3003  (rlUInt8_t*)(&data->calibChunk[idx]),
3004  (rlUInt16_t)sizeof(rlCalDataStore_t));
3005

3007  rlDriverConstructOutMsg(1U, &outMsg, &outPayloadSb);
3008  /* Fill in-message Payload */
3009  rlDriverFillPayload(0U, 0U, &outPayloadSb, NULL, 0U);
3010 
3011  /* Send Command to mmWave Radar Device */
3012  retVal += rlDriverCmdInvoke(deviceMap, inMsg, &outMsg);
3013  /* check for return value */

3015  {
